org.nd4j.aeron.ipc.chunk

Class NDArrayMessageChunk

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.aeron.ipc.chunk.NDArrayMessageChunk
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class NDArrayMessageChunk
extends Object
implements Serializable
    An NDArrayMessageChunk represents a chunked NDArrayMessage that needs to be reassembled. This chunking is for large messages that need to be segmented to be sent over the wire. An AeronNDArraySubscriber would use this information to assemble a contiguous buffer to be used for assembling a large NDArrayMessage Of note is that this chunk will also contain the needed data for assembling in addition to the desired metadata such as the chunk size. A chunk has an idea which is used to track the chunk across fragmentations, an index fr determining ordering for re assembling, and metadata about the chunk such as the chunk size and number of chunks
    Author:
    Adam Gibson
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • sizeForMessage

        public static int sizeForMessage(NDArrayMessageChunk chunk)
        Returns the overall size for an NDArrayMessageChunk. The size of a message chunk is: idLengthSize(4) + messageTypeSize(4) + indexSize(4) + chunkSizeSize(4) + numChunksSize(4) + chunk.getData().limit() + chunk.getId().getBytes().length Many of these are flat out integers and are mainly variables for accounting purposes and ease of readbility
        Parameters:
        chunk - the size of a message chunk
        Returns:
        the size of an ByteBuffer for the given NDArrayMessageChunk

      • toBuffer

        public static ByteBuffer toBuffer(NDArrayMessageChunk chunk)
        Convert an ndarray message chunk to a buffer.
        Parameters:
        chunk - the chunk to convert
        Returns:
        an ByteBuffer based on the passed in message chunk.

      • fromBuffer

        public static NDArrayMessageChunk fromBuffer(ByteBuffer byteBuffer,
                                             NDArrayMessage.MessageType type)
        Returns a chunk given the passed in ByteBuffer NOTE THAT THIS WILL MODIFY THE PASSED IN BYTEBUFFER's POSITION.
        Parameters:
        byteBuffer - the byte buffer to extract the chunk from
        Returns:
        the ndarray message chunk based on the passed in ByteBuffer
